content:

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:

[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: # This script simulates the behavior of a river\n# That is really cool.\n# However, this is a simulation. Shouldn't it stop sometimes ? This code that you have here, runs forever.\n# In case you wondering, i have left this to run for over half a day last night :)\n# Today is 5 May 2023\n# you created this script /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/river_simulation_2023-05-07.py which is an updated version, but you're still running the original version, not the updated one.\n\nimport time\n\nwhile True:\n    print('The river is flowing...')\n    time.sleep(1)\n"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "river_simulation.py"}}}'}]
